reviews.review_msg: Like a true statistician, he is totally unashamed of his nerdyness! :p

She knows her stuff really well, too well, I'd say, lol. She's actually very clear and make some very good notes, but sometimes her class is very boring which makes it hard to stay awake, :P. But otherwise, her exams are fair, as long as u truly understand the concepts. Assignments are tough, but doable. Only complaint: she didn't post solutions!

Uses the most simple example in class, and assignments have questions even grad students find difficult. Monotone, doesn't answer to emails, as final, puts questions from the assignments as practice questions.

Joan has a genuine excitement for statistics that I find to be contagious beyond the classroom. Her assignments helped me to engage with the material and challenged me exactly the right amount. She also happens to be a great person that will be in your corner if you demonstrate interest and effort in her class.
his stuff is hard. but he is a very good prof in stat dept. his notes and lecture talk is clear and easy to understand.
